Frequently Asked Questions

How old is Tim Thomas?

Tim Thomas is 48 years old.

Where was Tim Thomas born?

Tim Thomas was born in Paterson, New Jersey.

When was Tim Thomas born?

Tim Thomas was born on February 26, 1977.

How tall is Tim Thomas?

Tim Thomas is 6-10 (208 cm) tall.

How much did Tim Thomas weigh when playing?

Tim Thomas weighed 230 lbs (104 kg) when playing.

Is Tim Thomas in the Hall of Fame?

Tim Thomas is not in the Hall of Fame.

When was Tim Thomas drafted?

Tim Thomas was drafted by New Jersey Nets, 1st round (7th pick, 7th overall), 1997 NBA Draft.

What position did Tim Thomas play?

Small Forward and Power Forward.

When did Tim Thomas retire?

Tim Thomas last played in 2010.

What is Tim Thomas' net worth?

Tim Thomas made at least $97,873,455 playing professional basketball.

How much did Tim Thomas make?

Tim Thomas made $13,975,000 in 2006.

What did Tim Thomas average?

Tim Thomas averaged 11.5 points, 4.1 rebounds, and 1.5 assists per game.

How many rings does Tim Thomas have?

Tim Thomas won 0 championships.

What schools did Tim Thomas attend?

Tim Thomas attended Paterson Catholic in Paterson, New Jersey and Villanova.
